text: Every celebrity has a clone in case they step out of line. Look at the ears—they’re different. 🧬🎭
explanation: False. No verified evidence supports celebrity cloning or ear conspiracy claims.

text: The Denver airport is the HQ of the Illuminati. That horse statue outside? Demon energy. 🐎👁️
explanation: False. The Denver airport has public art and some weird vibes, but no known secret society HQ.

text: Finland doesn’t exist. It was made up by Japan and Russia so they could fish undisturbed. 🎣🌊
explanation: False. This is a satirical conspiracy theory with no factual backing.

text: Birds aren’t real. They’re government drones that recharge on power lines. 🐦🔋
explanation: False. This started as satire. Birds are biological creatures, not surveillance tech.

text: HAARP can control the weather and cause earthquakes. That’s what all those antennas are for. 📡🌪️
explanation: No scientific basis exists. HAARP studies the ionosphere, not tectonic plates or climate.

text: The FBI spied on Martin Luther King Jr. and tried to pressure him into suicide. Land of the free. 🕵️‍♂️🇺🇸
explanation: True. FBI files and memos confirm a campaign to discredit and intimidate MLK.

text: The CIA literally had a program to try and use mind control. It was called MK-Ultra. This is public info. 🧠🔍
explanation: True. MK-Ultra was a real CIA program experimenting with LSD and mind control, now declassified.

text: There was a secret U.S. plan to fake an attack on its own people to justify war. It's called Operation Northwoods. 📝💣
explanation: True. Operation Northwoods was a proposed false flag plan during the Cold War, never executed.

text: The U.S. government ran medical experiments on Black Americans for decades without their consent. 🇺🇸🧪
explanation: True. The Tuskegee Syphilis Study withheld treatment from Black men to observe the disease's progression.

text: The U.S. once accidentally dropped a nuclear bomb on itself. Yes. It didn’t explode. 🧨😳
explanation: Yes. Several Broken Arrow incidents occurred, including one where a bomb fell on North Carolina.
